original_title: 14-hour water cut in parts of Colombo today
original_body_lines: Parts of Colombo are experiencing a 14-hour water cut today (July 15), the National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) says.
Accordingly, the water supply for several areas in Colombo is suspended from 8.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m.
Colombo 01, 02, 03, 04, 07, 08, 09, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14 and 15 areas are affected by the water cut.
